aircraft.value: Wraith Silent - AC-4169-837 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Data link transmission errors. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 27/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 30/04/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 01/05/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 03/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 07/05/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
